name: Vesper
description: A support weapon custom-made for an insider of the Maidelin Foundation. Ms. Maidelin believes that Lyra could make proper use of it.

weaponEffects.title: Physical Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Physical Benediction
weaponEffects.description: Increase the entire team's physical ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is active.

normals.name: Normal Vesper Attack Passive
normals.description:
**Enlightenment**: Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack without Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the **Enlightenment mark**, equal to the number of Guards you carry × **2.1%** of ATK (no more than **12.6%** × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.

Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack with Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the **Enlightenment mark**, equal to the number of Guards you and teammates carry × **1.5%** of ATK (no more than **12%** × ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage.
**Glowing**: Upon hit, all of Vesper's normal attacks recover HP equal to **15%** of ATK.
**Sacred Strike**: Vesper's aerial attack and Accumulator can convert **60%** of charge to shatter.
**Guard**: For every **15%** loss of Max HP or every **300** weapon charge gained, obtain up to **5** Enlightenment Guards for yourself (can be produced in the off-hand slot). Enlightenment Guards lasts for **25** seconds. If you have the maximum number of Enlightenment Guards, the newly produced Enlightenment Guards will attack enemies, dealing physical damage equal to **48%** of ATK, then disappear. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects.

Note: In Bygone Phantasm, Vesper is not regarded as a support weapon.

normals.name: Normal Vesper Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, use Vesper to launch **5** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **81.6%** of ATK plus **490** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **59.1%** of ATK plus **355** and knock the target back significantly. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **123.9%** of ATK plus **743** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **173%** of ATK plus **1038** and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **196.4%** of ATK plus **1178** and launch the target.

normals.name: Frustration
normals.description:
While airborne, tap normal attack to unleash Frustration. Each punch deals damage equal to **33.2%** of ATK plus **199** and consumes **10** endurance. The last hit deals damage equal to **124.5%** of ATK plus **747** and launches the target.
When unleashing Frustration, grab the target if possible and throw it to the ground, dealing damage equal to **556.6%** of ATK plus **3339** in total.

normals.name: Accumulator
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack for up to **3** charges. **Strongly suspend** the target upon hit, and become immune from damage and control effects during an Accumulator attack. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase **1** charged hit: Deal damage equal to **96%** of ATK plus **576**.
Phase **2** charged hit: Deal damage equal to **223%** of ATK plus **1338**.
Phase **3** charged hit: Deal damage equal to **360.5%** of ATK plus **2163**.

normals.name: Shimmer
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack during normal attacks or after dodging to unleash Shimmer. Each punch deals damage equal to **20%** of ATK plus **120** and consumes **10** endurance. Release to trigger Accumulator.

normals.name: Pummel
normals.description:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger **3** mid-air charges. Release to pummel the ground and **strongly suspend** targets. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase **1** charged attack: Deal damage equal to **166.3%** of ATK plus **998**.
Phase **2** charged attack: Deal damage equal to **288.2%** of ATK plus **1729**.
Phase **3** charged attack: Deal damage equal to **454.4%** of ATK plus **2726**.

dodge.name: Mind Capture
dodge.description: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target to you and draw it in for **2** seconds, dealing damage equal to **261.4%** of ATK plus **1568**. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging can trigger **Shimmer** after unleashing **Mind Capture**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds and recover **250** endurance.

skill.name: Forgiveness Guard
skill.description:
**Forgiveness Guard**: When the healing effect overflows, gain an HP Shield equal to up to **25%** of Max HP. When Vesper has Forgiveness Guard, different guard effects are activated under different Resonances.
**Benediction Guard**: The skill is replaced with **Shinerise**, and the Wanderer earns no more Enlightenment Guard, which is converted to Forgiveness Guard for teammates. Earn **1** Forgiveness Guard for each **15%** of Max HP healed, and grant up to **1** Forgiveness Guard to every teammate. If every teammate has one, Forgiveness Guard deals physical damage equal to **60%** of ATK to an enemy and disappears. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects. Also, increase Max HP by **10%** for self and teammates. This effect cannot be stacked.
**Attack Guard**: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain a shield equal to **30%** of Max HP. Cooldown: **30** seconds.
**Fortitude Guard**: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain healing, restoring **2%** of Max HP per second for **20** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds.
**Balance Guard**: When HP is more than **50%**, increase shatter by **20%**. When HP is less than **50%**, increase final damage by **10%** and shatter by **10%**.

skill.name: Starfall
skill.description: Leap toward the target, dealing damage equal to **771%** of ATK plus **4212** and **strongly suspending** it. Inflict an Enlightenment mark on the target for **18** seconds. Cooldown: **20** seconds.

skill.name: Shinerise
skill.description: Pummel the ground and **strongly launch** targets in front, dealing damage equal to **771%** of ATK plus **4212** and summoning up to **3** **Blades** for **75** seconds (up to **1** Blade every **2** meters). This skill can be used up to **3** times, with a cooldown of **20** seconds each time. When **2** **Blades** exist on the field, a **Clearshine** is created. When a **Blade** is touched, it heals targets within the movement radius, restoring HP equal to **25%** of the target's ATK. When **3** **Blades** exist, a **Nebula** is created. When a **Blade** is touched, it damages targets within the movement radius, dealing damage equal to **150%** of ATK × movement distance / **5**m.

discharge.name: Chanting Sigh
discharge.description: When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to **748.1%** of ATK plus **4488** and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for **18** seconds, during which damage immunity lasts **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.description: When releasing any weapon skill or discharge, if your Guards are at the maximum, the Guard duration will be refreshed, dealing physical damage equal to **30%** of physical ATK × number of Guards to the enemy. Up to **8** Guards when under the effect of Benediction, and up to **6** when without it.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

Increase all damage dealt by Guards by **20%**, and increase the guarded target's final damage by **0.15%** for **10 seconds** when releasing any weapon skill or discharge under the effect of Benediction Resonance.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Forgiveness Guard: After releasing Resonance **5** times, receive **1** chance to negate lethal damage for the wielder and the guarded target. After a teammate negates lethal damage, they will consume Forgiveness Guard and recover **0.05%** of Max HP. Unavailable in Apex League.
Enlightenment Guard: After releasing Resonance **5** times and when having Enlightenment Guard, the wielder receives **2** chances to negate lethal damage. Stack up to **5** times. After the wielder negates lethal damage, they will consume **1** stack of Enlightenment Guard and recover **0.05%** of Max HP. Unavailable in Apex League.

When unleashing any weapon skill or discharge, the increase of final damage and healing depends on the number of Guards. Each Guard increases final damage and healing by **1.6%**, up to **8%** for **2500 seconds**.
